name: Hellspawn
html:
“Let justice be done, though the Heavens Fall.”

 

“Wake up…”

A soft lady-like voice is calling me. It’s the same voice that I’m been hearing for a while.

It keeps telling me to wake up.

Wake up? Why do I need someone to tell me to wake up?

Have I been sleeping?

Wait. I’m having a bit of trouble moving my body.

Slowly.

Ah, it seems that I can feel my body now.

My arms, fingers, then my legs, I can feel them.

It’s pitch black in here, and the surface seems rough. I think I’m inside a cave.

Oh, there’s some light upfront. Let’s take a look.

What appears in front of me is a small pond, but it emits a faintly luminous light.

The water seems clear and I can touch it.

I wash my hands, then my face with it.

Wait. Who is this guy?

That was the first question in my head as soon as I saw my reflection in the water.

That’s me?

Black hair and a face resembling a young adult, was what I could see.

Who is this?

That’s right. I’m asking that question.

I have no idea who I am right now. I cannot even recognise my own face.

Memory loss?

No, it cannot be. I know who I am.

I know what I normally look like. I can still imagine it right now.

Ah… That’s right. I died.

All my life, I strived to become the perfect me in other people’ eyes.

In the end, I achieved nothing. Nobody ever understood me.

I still could hear all of those praises of how talented or how much of a genius I was.

I still could remember the very same people giving me the disappointed looks when I decided to be who I really was for once.

I ran away… from my family, my future, my life.

On that cold rainy night, I sat with my back against the wall of an old shop, watching others smiling and happily strolled pass.

It was until I saw a pile of steel beams losing their balance above a couple of teenagers.

I yelled at them, but the sound of rain and their umbrellas prevented them from noticing me.

As if my duty called, I ran at them, hoping that I could make it in time.

Well, I did. They were safe.

I remembered them on their knees, panicking and trying to wake me up.

I remembered the street lights slowly dimmed away.

I remembered the agonising pain and helplessness that I felt at the last second.

How could I forget?

So I closed my eyes, then found myself here, in a stranger’s body.

It seems like I was reincarnated.

I’ve read these stories so many times but I just can’t believe it. 

I was reincarnated? For what exactly?

I wasted my entire life once. What can I even hope to achieve in this new life?

Is this the work of some Gods up there?

Are they mocking me, or are they feeling pity towards me that they decided to give me another chance?

While falling into deep thoughts, I continue walking and without knowing, I have already arrived at the exit.

What appears in front of me is a great scene of a long running forest and a beautiful blue sky with a crack.

A crack?

There is actually a huge crack in the sky, looking like it’s split in half.

What happened? I wonder.

When I look back, it looks like I was really in a cave.

Hm? Has it changed?

I don’t believe that the path looks like this before.

Ah… All of these are giving me a real headache.

Wait, am I naked?

That thought quickly crossed my mind because this seemed to happen very often.

Fortunately, I am wearing pants.

It’s ragged and old, but it’s enough to cover the vital spot.

I continue walking along any road that I can find for hours.

Jesus. Am I even going to see a single soul out here?

Wait. Is it just me or am I seeing things?

Oh, a town? There’s a town up ahead of the road.

I entered.

I cannot express how crazy this is.

The street is not too crowded and there isn’t any particular event or festival happening right now.

Rather, it’s the people that I’m talking about.

Some have long ears, some have horns, and some look like a beast in the upper body.

I’ve seen these races so many times in fictional movies but hell, it feels different when I see it with your own eyes.

I’m really in a fantasy world.

I look at the huge notice board on the side, and see multiple papers that seem like a bounty pinned on it.

Right in the middle there, a scary looking monster-like face with sharp teeth and horns can be seen.

It also has a red circle just below the image and a number that seems to be higher than the others.

I guess this is one of those dangerous monsters that I need to avoid.

I don’t want to get myself killed so early on in this second life.

Somehow or another afterwards, I wandered into a street market.

There is just so much food here.

The smell of them is driving me insane.

I can tell my stomach fully shares the same thought with me right now.

But… I don’t even have a single coin on my body.

What currency do they even use in this world?

“How are you doing, sir? Would you like to try out some of our special fried chicken wings?”

A man who looked like the owner of the store spoke to me.

“…”

I’m quite surprised. I was originally afraid that I might not be able to communicate with the folks here but for some strange reasons, I can understand what he just said.

I know this is not any of the languages that I’ve ever heard of before, but I just… understand.

However, I don’t know what to reply. I don’t have money… and fried chicken wings?

I was expecting something extraordinary in this world, like cockatrice wings or something.

“Sir?”

The man continued to look at me confusingly.

You still don’t get it? Look, I’m hungry... but I’m broke.

Get me at least a piece for free if you’re a decent man. Come on.

“Do you want to eat that?”

Suddenly, a soft feminine voice came out beside me.

When I turned around, it was a cute looking young lady with dark blue hair and a small ponytail on the side.

I feel ashamed to ever need the help of others when it comes to food, especially when it comes from a cute looking girl like her.

But I nodded anyway.

She bought me two pieces of those fried chicken wings.

I obviously mauled them straight away.

“Are you homeless?”

This hits my heart harder than anything else.

Do I look like a homeless person to you?

That’s what I really want to say but she’s right.

I’m homeless. God damn it.

“Yes.” I uttered my reply in shame.

“I’m sorry. I cannot repay you for your kindness.” I continued on.

“It’s alright. You don’t need to repay me. I just want to help people who are in need of help.”

Is she an angel? Who else would do something like this and say these words afterwards?

“Do you need a place to stay? It might get cold at night.” She asked.

I cannot believe it myself. A beautiful girl asked me to stay for a night.

I think I’m slowly starting my protagonist arc like those trending reincarnation stories.

“I’d really love to, but… doesn’t it trouble you too much?”

That’s right. I need to be humble.

I cannot take the offer too quickly or it might look like I’m too clingy.

“No. Definitely not. As I said before, I feel glad that I can offer help.”

It’s been confirmed that she’s an angel.

I followed her down a few streets.

“It’s just around the corner.”

She’s guiding me to her house.

I never knew that it’s such a pleasant feeling to follow a girl to her place.

Wait a minute.

We turned around the corner, yet this does not seem like a shelter to me at all.

It’s a small and dark alley, with a dead end.

“Excuse me, but I think there is some kind of mistake here?”

I don’t want to embarrass her by telling her directly that she got lost.

“No, there isn’t.”

She confidently replies without turning back.

Now this seems wrong. I think I should get out of here.

I turned around, and there were already another two huge guys behind me, blocking the path.

“Is this the fine good you’re talking about?” One of the men spoke.

Excuse me, but good?

Shit. This really does not sound good to me at all.

“I think I’m fine with sleeping on the street tonight. Thank you for your earlier kindness. I will definitely repay them in the future.”

I quickly spoke and hoped that I could still turn this around.

!!!

What the fuck.

One of those guys just punched me right in the face.

Argh… That freaking hurts.

I need to get my ass out of here.

I turn back to the girl and try to run with my full speed, hoping that I can get past her.

It’s better to face a cute girl than two juggernauts, isn’t it?

But dear, I was wrong.

She whipped out the chain that I had no idea where she was hiding it from and wrapped it around me before I could even react.

Alright. I’m sorry.

I might have some impudent thoughts but I was in the wrong.

Would saying these words save me from this trouble?

I wish it could.

I try to break out of the chain but the other two guys catch up and want to hand me my second fist meal of the day.

Out of intuition, I dodge it but I get myself tripped and fall down on my left arm.

Before I can recover my standing, one of the guys throws a strong kick at my abdomen.

I cough out what I hope isn’t blood.

The other guy quickly pins me down and with his huge ass, I don’t have a hope of getting out of this anymore.

The cute girl walks over, bends down and with her finger, she tastes my blood.

“This blood. This taste. It’s amazing.”

Okay...

“I haven’t had this for a very long time.” She seemed pleased with my blood.

I don’t know if it’s something I should be proud of right now.

“Take him to the butcher. His organs should be able to get us some decent meals for the next few months.”

Oh no... It’s these organ trafficking crimes that I saw from the news back then.

Am I going to die again?

Only a few hours after my reincarnation?

Is that it? I only last for a few hours?!

!!!

Before I even realise, the huge guy on top of me already flies away.

Then in the next moment, the other guy is cut in half.

Terrified, the cute girl is shaking immensely.

“No… Please… Have I offended you?”

She looks like she’s begging, but not for long before her head flies off.

They just… died. Right. In. Front. Of. Me.

“Don’t need to pity them. They are long wanted criminals. The streets are better without them.”

A lady-like voice answered as if she could read my thoughts.

I try my best to sit up and take a better look at my saviour

It’s another beauty with long bright blue hair, but compared to the one before, this one has a much better body proportion.

If the one before was cute, this one would be the beautiful one.

I quickly noticed the bloodied claymore on her hand, which summed up why she was wearing partially armour.

“Are you okay?” She asked.

Do I look like I’m okay to you?

I wanted to say that, but when I looked properly, my wounds were not that serious.

The blood from my nose has already stopped.

“Come. I’ll help you.” She spoke shortly.

I followed her to her place.

I know this was a dumb idea but I just wasn’t the brightest guy in this area.

However, this time, it’s the real one. She’s currently living in the inn.

When we enter, the inn keeper and other nearby drinkers greet her.

It seems like she’s already here for a while.

In her room, she takes out a box that has several first-aid items and hands it over to me.

“Use them and cover up your wound. I’ll wash myself off the blood first.”

She spoke coldly, but I could feel a sense of warmth in there.

“Wait. May I ask who you are?”

I wanted to know just who exactly saved me.

“Maria.”

She answered bluntly and entered the bathroom.

Maria, is it? That’s not a bad name.

I take up a bandaging roll and plan to wrap around the wound from my left arm when I fell earlier.

“What’s your name?” A voice came out from within the bathroom.

“Me?”

“Who else?”

Yes, that was stupid. Why would I ask that?

But what’s my name? Should I just use my real name from my previous life?

“I… don’t know.”

“You don’t know?”

“Yes. I don’t know.”

“…”

It seems that she does not understand why I do not have a name.

Maybe here, even the homeless guy on the street would have a name.

Of course, I am not comparing myself to these guys but still, I might have looked even below them without knowing my own name.

“I’m not from this world.” I explained.

I think it is alright to tell the truth. My truth, at least.

“What do you mean?” She replied.

“I was reincarnated into this world.”

“Reincarnated?”

“Yes, when someone dies and is reborn in another body.”

“I know what reincarnation is.”

“Oh… Pardon me.”

I feel pretty stupid now to explain the concept of reincarnation.

Everybody knows that.

“Do you know who you were?”

“…”

Should I tell her?

I remember that things never end up in a good way when a protagonist tells other people about the reincarnation.

“I don’t know.” Let’s just avoid the question for now.

“…”

As I suspected, she went quiet after.

She must be thinking what kind of odd ball she was talking to.

“Do you know what mana is?”

“Mana?”

I know what mana is but I just want to confirm what it really is in this world.

“Mana fills this world. We are also born with initial mana within our bodies.”

“I see.”

“The reason why those criminals targeted you earlier was so that they could extract your organs, which should have contained fragments of your mana, and sell them to the rich.”

“What?”

“People seek this because they believe this is the easiest way to become stronger. The amount of mana determines how strong you are.”

“So they just conduct cannibalism here?”

“No. There are alchemists who extract the mana out of your organs and create some sort of drinkable potions. They can also use your mana to craft many other artifacts too.”

“Seriously?”

“…”

“Sorry, please continue on.”

“While some have the ability to tell, for the ordinary ones, there are devices out there that could estimate the amount of mana a person has.”

“I see.”

“You must have possessed a high volume of mana within your body. That was why those guys targeted you.”

“…”

So, in other words, I am supposed to be strong?

“Does that mean I can use a lot of powerful magic spells?”

“…”

Was that something odd to ask?

If you were told that you had a large volume of mana, wouldn’t that mean you could cast powerful spells endlessly?

“It does not work that way in this world.”

She said in this world. I think she actually takes up my words of being reincarnated. 

I’m glad.

“Argh…” She muttered.

“What’s wrong?”

“I think I was injured earlier.”

“Oh… Sorry.”

I feel bad that she got hurt because of me.

“Can you help me?” She asked.

“Help… you?”

What, seriously? Are you asking me to help you, while you’re in the bathroom?

In the first place, what can I even help you with?

“Can you bring me the box?”

Ah, the first-aid. That’s right. She gave it to me.

“Here.”

I opened the door slightly, just enough to shove the box in.

I wanted to take a peek but I would feel extremely guilty to do that to my saviour.

“I… can’t reach it.”

What? Was she really that hurt to not be able to walk just a few steps?

Blood. I can clearly see them on the floor.

This is bad.

I shouldn’t think too much about this. Plus, she was the one who asked me anyway.

“Coming in.”

I opened the door and entered.

Wow. She’s actually naked.

From her back, I could see a gorgeous body shape, so alluring that I might jump over at any second.

But a large cut mark was also there. This explains the blood on the floor.

It’s odd though. I cannot recall that she was even injured by those guys.

Well, it must be one of those old wounds seeing how she must have been battling criminals multiple times.

I take out the disinfection bottle and the bandaging roll.

“Do you… Can you do it by yourself?” I asked.

It’s better if I can make sure first.

“No… I can’t.” She replied.

Yay.

No, I should not be happy, or even excited over this.

I’m so despicable to even think of it this way.

I’m applying the medicine on her wound and carefully wrapping the bandage over the wound.

Once every while, I can hear her moan from the pain.

Don’t get aroused by it. Don’t get aroused by it!

I repeatedly tell myself.

You have no idea how difficult it is to hold myself back from this softness during the contact.

“Thank you.”

“No worries. I should be the one to thank you in the first place.”

I’ve finished with the bandaging process.

I think it’s not nice for me to continue staying here so I turn around and plan to leave.

“Wait…”

She holds me back.

Her hand is keeping me from leaving the bathroom.

For this to happen, I believe she is facing me right now.

Should I turn around?

“Don’t leave.” She begged.

“Sorry, but…”

“Don’t leave.”

She repeated, so I stopped.

“It’s been a while since someone speaks to me.”

Is she confessing now?

Regardless, I thought she was popular.

Are all the men in this world blind or something to not talk to such a beauty like her?

“I don’t know why, but people have always been avoiding me.”

Avoiding her, who the hell would?

“Over time, I could only feel sad and lonely.

I tried to be friendly and open to the people around me but… I just could not.

I’m bad at communicating. Each time, I could only speak a few words.

At the beginning, it was alright, but later on, people would start to get annoyed by it.

They would say things like I don’t care about them or how cold I am.

But I’m not.”

“I’m sorry to hear that.”

I would have never thought that a beautiful girl like her would be this depressed.

Just as I thought that, she embraced me from behind.

Her arms wrapped around my body and I could feel the softness and plump from her flesh on my back.

“So please… don’t leave me.”

“No. I won’t.”

What kind of man would I be if I was to leave you in this state?

“Thank you. I’m so touched.”

I’m glad she feels this way about me.

“I just want to stay by your side forever.”

Wait, isn’t this going too fast?

We’ve only just met.

“I think I cannot hold back anymore…”

Woah what do you mean by you cannot hold back anymore?

Seriously, I am going to turn...

!!!

“Harhh!”

What is going on? Where am I?

I look around and find myself inside a cave.

What happened? My head hurts but I slowly recall.

I was supposed to embrace Maria, but before I could turn around, something knocked me out.

Were we attacked? If that is so, I need to find her now.

“GRAAAHHHHH!!!”

“Holyshit! What was that?!”

What appears in front of me is a huge monster with sharp spikes all over the body.

It stares at me with an open mouth, full of large and sharp teeth, but it cannot reach me due to the chains on its limbs.

This… is the same one from the notice board?

No way. I am going to die for sure this time.

“I’m trying to hold back for so long… but I cannot anymore.”

This sound… It’s Maria.

“The moment I saw you, I could tell the amount of mana inside you was absurd. When the other criminals went for you as well, it confirmed my findings. I knew that I would do anything to get you here.” She spoke in a wicked tone.

“Wait a second. I don’t get this. What is going on here?”

If I was in my previous life, I would never ask this. I would be pissing my pants right now.

Maybe it was because this is the second life and it’s not my real body, I feel calm enough to still ask questions.

“It’s simple. It eats you, becomes stronger then kills everybody.”

“What? Why would you want to do that? And why me?”

I know that I’m in deep trouble now but I still don’t understand her motive and the whole thing behind everything that happened today.

Click*

The rest of the chains holding onto this monstrous beast fell out from the wall behind it, giving it more freedom on its movement.

“Oh shit…”

It then leaps at me. I evade to the side and roll under its right arm to get behind it.

I struggle to get my balance since both of my arms are tied up.

Before I can even get up, it swings its gigantic arm at me, sending me straight into the wall at the back.

“Not again…” I coughed out drops of blood.

That hit must have fractured some of my bones or organs.

“Why are you running, dear?” Maria smirked from the corner, faraway from the beast.

“What do you mean by why am I running? You’re trying to kill me!” I angrily shouted.

“But you were so excited a moment ago. I was going to grant you a painless and happy death. Isn’t it what every man desires?”

“As if...”

I struggle but still manage to get on my feet. Luckily the hit from earlier managed to cut off the rope around my wrists so now I can move around a bit more easier.

“How cute of you…” Her voice sickens me.

The monster turns around and readies to enjoy its meal.

My vision is fading from the blood loss. This is not looking good at all.

On my first day and I’m hanging on the death rope twice already?

I refuse to accept this!

I try to get away but the monster is right in front of me.

From the side, Maria is laughing… wickedly.

“Go on and enjoy your next--- reincarnation.”

The monster swings its arm up and smashes me.

!!!

“What is this?!” 

I’m still alive.

I look up and see myself holding a black sword, blocking the monster’s arm.

I can sense some energy within myself so I strongly push the monster’s arm away.

For some odd reasons, I can feel more strength flowing within my body.

What is this sword? Is this my power?

“You! You have a Blessing?!” Maria shouted.

Blessing? What the heck are you talking about?

Is this what they call the weapon here?

Suddenly, the monster leaps at me again to rip me apart.

I step aside and swing my sword almost naturally, cutting its waist.

“Arghhh!!!” It cried.

What is going on? Why do I know what to do?

Am I doing this on my own or is this sword guiding me?

The normal me from previous life would have pissed his pants but I don’t know why I don’t feel afraid to stand up against this monstrous beast.

Is it… because of this body that I’m currently in?

The monster does not let me continue my thought process and slashes angrily at me.

However, it results in the monster losing one of its arms.

Seeing the arm fly off in a single cut, I believe that this sword is very sharp.

I have to be careful when handling it.

I feel that I’m slowly turning this around.

The monster becomes even more enraged and its body expands.

The arm that I just cut off grows back and the spikes on its back also become larger.

Man… Did I speak too soon?

The monster charges right at me, as if it will crush everything on its path.

I grab firmly on my sword, and just when the monster is able to hit me, I evade the attack and counter it with a side sweep.

Before I could finish my slash, the monster slams its arm on me and sends me rolling back to where I woke up.

My sword is now stuck on its waist.

“What am I going to do now…” I asked myself in desperation.

However, the monster is hesitating a bit.

“What’s going on?” Even Maria is unsure of the monster’s behaviour.

I see it.

The black sword that stabs onto its waist is spreading out some kinds of corrosion and causing the area around it to crumble.

The monster grabs the sword but the pain sears through its hand.

However, it’s still able to pull out the sword since it wasn’t a deep cut and throws it away.

“What is that sword? How are you able to do this?” Maria asked.

As if I know. It still doesn’t matter anyway.

I can no longer move my body.

I can tell some of my ribs are broken and my organs are damaged.

Blood is oozing out nonstop from both my mouth and my abdomen.

Hah… How foolish of myself to even think that I would ever be any protagonist.

I close my eyes and accept my defeat.

“Ice Lance.”

!!!

I open my eyes again to see dozens of lances made out of ice flying towards the monster, forcing it back to the wall.

The monster roars and wants to retaliate but its feet are frozen already.

“Icicle Crash.”

Another wave of sharp ice appears out of nowhere and rains down on the monster.

“GRAAAHHHHH!!!”

One last roar comes out before the monster falls.

“Are you okay?” A soft and charming voice comes out behind me.

The image is vivid but it appears like another young lady has come to my aid.

Ah… I’m tired. It feels like the same thing is repeating itself.

I close my eyes and succumb to the darkness.
